panels.title: Cluster
panels.description: cls = ${cls}. Used as an unique cluster identifier and resource namespace.

panels.title: Service
panels.description: Services in cluster ${cls}. On(green) means current instance are member of that service. Off(orange) means the opposite.

panels.title: Proxies
panels.description: All haproxy instances in this cluster ${cls}

panels.title: CLS ID
panels.description: ip = ${ip}. Unique identifier for corresponding node

panels.title: Configuration
panels.description: Important configuration entries of this instance

value.title: PGSQL Instance for replication source instance ${__data.fields.SRC}
PGSQL Instance for replication destination instance ${__data.fields.DST}

panels.title: Leadership
panels.description: Leadership shows who is in charge of this cluster ${cls}

Overall pressure for this PostgreSQL Node and Instance. 
max(node:ins:cpu_usage, pg:ins:load, pgbouncer:ins:load)
Alerting event graph. Each stripe represent an alerting Event. Gray transparent stipe are pending alerts.

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.name: cls
list.label: Cluster
